name: Teleport Maze [Mid-Jam 2020, fixed]
description:
Note: This is the fixed version of my Mid-Jam 2020 submission with fixed errors and a possible level (to see the jam version, that's unbeatable go here!).

A game I made for the Mid-Jam 2020 together with Dr. Wuro in less than a day.

The goal is the exit of the maze, you will need to go through a lot of teleporters to get there!

Some teleporters will have levers with the same colors.

Controls: Left/Right/Up/Down arrows - Movement
